data.title: Quick Facts | Dwight Howard
data.meta_description: Eight-time All-Star Dwight Howard has had an illustrious career. In his 16th NBA season, Howard earned the most recent NBA championship as a member of the 2019-20 Lakers. Next stop on his journey: the Philadelphia 76ers. Get to know the new Sixer a bit betterâ€¦ Before growing into one of the most dominant bigs in league history, Howard was an impressive high school prospect in his hometown of Atlanta, GA.
